horror.title: The Haunting of Bly Manor
horror.description: After an au pairâ€™s tragic death, Henry hires a young American nanny to care for his orphaned niece and nephew who reside at Bly Manor with the chef Owen, groundskeeper Jamie and housekeeper, Mrs. Grose.

horror.title: Lovecraft Country
horror.description: A young African-American travels across the U.S. in the 1950s in search of his missing father.
